page.title: Coats of arms of dependent territories

revisions.rev:

==[[United Kingdom]]== === [[Crown dependency|Crown dependencies]] === <gallery> File:Coat of arms of Guernsey.svg|[[Coat of arms of Guernsey|Coat of arms of]] [[Guernsey]] <!-- Missing image removed: File:Herm coa.gif|Coat of Arms of [[Herm]] --> File:Jersey coa.svg|[[Coat of arms of Jersey|Coat of arms of]] [[Jersey]] File:Isle of Man coat of arms.svg|[[Coat of arms of the Isle of Man|Coat of arms of the]] [[Isle of Man]] File:Escudo de Sark.svg|Coat of arms of [[Sark]] (part of [[Guernsey]]) </gallery>
===Overseas territories=== <gallery> File:Coat of Arms of Anguilla.svg|[[Coat of arms of Anguilla|Coat of arms of]] [[Anguilla]] File:Royal Coat of Arms of the United Kingdom (HM Government).svg|[[Ascension Island]] (part of [[Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha]]) does not have its own unique coat of arms. The [[Coat of Arms of the United Kingdom]] is used instead. File:Royal Coat of Arms of the United Kingdom (HM Government).svg|Like Ascension Island, [[Akrotiri and Dhekelia]] do not have their own unique coat of arms. The [[Coat of Arms of the United Kingdom]] is used instead. File:Coat_of_arms_of_Bermuda.svg|[[Coat of arms of Bermuda|Coat of arms of]] [[Bermuda]] File:British Antarctic Territory COA.svg|[[Coat of arms of the British Antarctic Territory|Coat of arms of]] [[British Antarctic Territory]] File:British Indian Ocean Territory coat of arms.svg|[[Coat of arms of the British Indian Ocean Territory|Coat of arms of]] [[the British Indian Ocean Territory]] File:Coat of Arms of the British Virgin Islands.svg|[[Coat of arms of the British Virgin Islands|Coat of arms of]] [[British Virgin Islands]] File:Coat of arms of Cayman Islands.svg|[[Coat of arms of the Cayman Islands|Coat of arms of]] [[Cayman Islands]] File:Coa Falkland.svg|[[Coat of arms of the Falkland Islands|Coat of arms of]] [[Falkland Islands]] File:Coat_of_arms_of_Gibraltar1.svg|[[Coat of arms of Gibraltar|Coat of arms of]] [[Gibraltar]] File:Coat_of_arms_of_Montserrat.svg|[[Coat of arms of Montserrat|Coat of arms of]] [[Montserrat]] File:Coat of Arms of the Pitcairn Islands.svg|[[Coat of arms of the Pitcairn Islands|Coat of arms of]] [[Pitcairn Island]]
File:Coat_of_arms_of_Saint_Helena.svg|<center>[[Coat of arms of Saint Helena|Coat of arms of]] [[Saint Helena]] (part of [[Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha]]) File:Coat of arms of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands.svg|<center>[[Coat of arms of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands|Coat of arms of]] [[South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands]] File:Coat of arms of Tristan da Cunha.svg|[[Coat of arms of Tristan da Cunha|Coat of arms of]] [[Tristan da Cunha]] (part of [[Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha]]) </gallery>
===Former Crown Colonies/Territories=== <gallery> File:Coat of arms of Hong Kong (1959-1997).svg|[[Coat of Arms of Hong Kong|Coat of Arms of]] [[Hong Kong|British Hong Kong]] </gallery>
==[[United States]]== <gallery> File:Coat of Arms of American Samoa.svg|[[Seal of American Samoa|Seal of]] [[American Samoa]] File:Coat of arms of Guam.svg|[[Seal of Guam|Seal of]] [[Guam]] File:Northern Mariana Islands seal.png|[[Seal of the Northern Mariana Islands|Seal of the]] [[Northern Mariana Islands]] File:Coa American Virgin Islands.gif|[[Seal of the United States Virgin Islands|Seal of the]] [[US Virgin Islands]] File:Coat of Arms of Puerto Rico.svg|[[Coat of arms of Puerto Rico|Coat of Arms of]] [[Puerto Rico]] </gallery>
